sab_tkinterwindow module¶

class sab_tkinterwindow.TimeFeatureWindow(time_features, win_size='1200x780')¶

Bases: object

Tkinter Interface to visualise TimeFeatures instances. Allow to visualise :

  • ERPs
  • ERP images
  • Feature distribution
  • Correlation between hits features and reaction times
  • Clustering

It takes as input the TimeFeatures instance.

Methods

create_colorbar_axis() Create the colorbar axis
destroy_colorbar_axis() Destroy the colorbar axis
onclusteralgochanged(evt) Called when the user select the clustering algorithm
onconditionselect() Called when the user change the selected conditions
onfeatureselect(evt) Called when the user select features
onplotmethodselect() Called when the user select a different analysis to plot
onvalidate_nclusters(val) Called when the user changes the number of clusters
plot_figure() Plot the figure given the current selected parameters
set_feature_name_list() Set the feature name in the left side listbox
set_main_graph() Set the main center graph
start() Start the application
update_time_sel(val) Called when the time slider is modified
